DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase I study of an investigational cancer drug, CYC116, in patients with advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Pharmacologic Study of CYC116, an Oral Aurora Kinase Inhibitor, in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
